    • Caring About Animals » 05 Nov 2019
      The fundamental shift in thinking comes from a belief that non-human animals are not that different from us, and acknowledge, what's now proved beyond doubt, that they experience pain and suffering very much like us. Once that's established, other arguments start to make sense.

    • Time to Read » 03 Nov 2019
      That feeling of getting inundated with ideas, freeing yourself from the constraints and conditioning of the real-world and letting your mind escape into a world of infinite potential and possibilities, asking yourself big questions and looking for answers within, is hugely inspiring and empowering.

    • My First Ultra » 28 Oct 2019
      I was turning 30 in October and a random goal popped in my mind - to run at least 30 miles. The shortest official distance that meets the criterion is 50k, which is about 32 miles. The longest I had run so far was a 35k the year before, which is about 22.5 miles. So it looked like an ambitious, formidable, yet doable challenge. It was past the Labor Day weekend, so I had already lost the first week of September...

      posted in  running
